title: Can't set a custom background image
body:
I work for a company which has asked me to use a branded/professional background image when meeting clients

I attempted using the fakecam project, but it had limitations that didn't meet my needs. I also tried installing the Teams Windows app through Wine and Bottles, but the installation failed.

Windows, MacOS, iOS and Android users has support for custom backgrounds, it would be very appreciated to finally have this feature available on Linux if it is possible.
